about.title: About Us
about.description: We have been part of the sports and social fabric of Sant Josep since 2025. Our club combines grassroots, competitive and inclusive programs, being a community reference in table tennis.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive to provide the highest quality in all our training and activities.
about.communityDesc: We foster an environment where members support each other and grow together.
about.growthDesc: We promote personal and sporting development at each person’s pace.
about.mission: Promote table tennis as a tool for health, integration and personal development, reaching all sectors of society.
about.vision: To be a benchmark club at regional and national levels, recognized for its sporting, educational and social impact.
about.valuesLead: We believe in sport as a vehicle for values and in the power of community to grow together.
about.valuesDesc: The principles that guide our work and understanding of sport.

values.inclusionDesc: An environment where everyone, regardless of age or ability, finds their place in table tennis.
values.integrationDesc: A meeting space for learning and mutual support for youth, adults and families.
values.developmentDesc: Personal and sporting development with methods tailored to every stage.

about.teamIntro: Behind Club Esportiu Joventut are passionate people who make every training, project and achievement possible.
about.coachDesc: With a solid background in table tennis, Adrián combines experience, training and passion for teaching. He drives our sports project, guiding young talents and veteran players to their full potential.

trainings.title: Training Programs
trainings.description: Discover the training program that best fits your level and availability. At Club Esportiu Joventut TT in Sant Josep de sa Talaia we offer 1.5-hour table tennis sessions designed to improve technique, fitness and game confidence. Choose your plan and enjoy motivating, inclusive and effective training.
trainings.mainProgramsDesc: Choose the program that matches your skill level and commitment
trainings.beginnerDesc: Start table tennis at your own pace, with enthusiasm.
trainings.competitionDesc: See progress week after week and level up.
trainings.adultsDesc: Train intensely and reach your best version.
trainings.locationClub: Club Robinson 350, 07830, Sant Josep de sa Talaia
trainings.specialProgramsDesc: Additional training options for specific needs
trainings.youthDesc: Specialized program for young talents aged 8-16
trainings.flexSchedule: Choose the schedule that suits you best among available sessions (flexible)
trainings.completeTraining: Complete training with technical, tactical and physical work
trainings.youthMore: Solid technical fundamentals, coordination and agility through games and circuits, sports habits and goal-based tracking.
trainings.privateMore: Technical diagnosis with immediate corrections, personal progression plan, video analysis and competition prep.
trainings.corporateMore: Team dynamics to improve communication and cooperation. Inclusive, fun activities. Custom packages at your site or at our club.

join.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
join.description: Become part of Club Esportiu Joventut and experience the excitement of table tennis in a supportive and competitive environment. Your journey to excellence starts here.
join.choosePlanDesc: Select the membership that matches your commitment and goals
join.applicationDesc: Fill out the form below to join Club Esportiu Joventut
join.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy of Club Esportiu Joventut.
join.agreeNewsletter: I would like to receive newsletters and updates about club events and activities.
join.reviewMessage: We will review your application and contact you within 24 hours.
join.whyJoinDesc: Experience the benefits of being part of our community
join.expertCoachingDesc: Learn from certified coaches with years of competitive experience and proven training methods.
join.modernFacilitiesDesc: Train in our state-of-the-art facilities with professional equipment and optimal playing conditions.
join.competitiveOpportunitiesDesc: Take part in tournaments, leagues, and competitions to test your skills and reach your goals.
join.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with passionate players and lifelong friends

join.loveGameDesc: Develop your passion for table tennis with expert guidance
join.specialOffer: 🎉 Launch offer: any program for just €29/month for 3 months. Train 1, 2 or 3 days a week at the same price.
